messages.title: VOTE FOR A FRESH START
messages.content: Adam Symons and the Lib Dems will start to do for you

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Time to rebate business rates for local shops; campaign for post-Brexit support for our fishermen
Lobby for support when High Street banks leave towns
Campaign to keep services at North Devon District Hospital
Ensure that there is good support for older people
Helping schools that need to improve standards
